name: Week 0 - INTRO
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design I
lessons.description: The nozzle is the part of a rocket engine that converts the energy of the propellant into kinetic energy. The nozzle is designed to accelerate the propellant to a high speed and direct it in the desired direction. The nozzle is designed to accelerate the propellant to a high speed and direct it in the desired direction.
